text: Paul Mantee (January 9, 1931 â€“ November 7, 2013) was an American movie and television actor. He was known for his roles in Cagney & Lacey, Simon & Simon, Barnaby Jones, and in Quincy, M.E.. == Early life and career == Mantee was born Paul Marianetti in San Francisco, California on January 9, 1931. He studied at San Mateo Junior College. Mantee enlisted in the U.S. Navy for four years during the Korean Warp.192 Weaver, Tom Paul Mantee Interview Science Fiction and Fantasy Film Flashbacks McFarland that made him decide on acting as a career. == Personal life == He was married to Suzy Davis Mantee. He was formerly married to actress Ann Newman. Mantee died on November 7, 2013 in his Los Angeles, California home from prostate cancer, aged 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Paul Mantee at Allmovie *Notice of death Category:1931 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from San Francisco
title: Paul Mantee
